sentence.Network_en: Advantage: good adhesion and maintenance , keep warm , heat insolation, stable and endurable.
sentence.Network_cn: 具有接着力、保持力强、减震性佳及固定 、 保温、隔热作用等优点.

sentence.Network_en: Weatherize your house, increase insolation , get a energe audit.
sentence.Network_cn: 对你的房屋进行评估, 提高隔热性能.

sentence.Network_en: The coefficient of performance ( COP ) of PV - SAHP is improved because the evaporating process under insolation.
sentence.Network_cn: 另一方面,PV-SAHP系统热泵循环的的蒸发过程在太阳直接辐照条件下完成,使得热泵循环的性能系数COP明显提高,也减少了热泵冬季供暖时常出现的运行不稳定和结霜等缺憾.

医用术语中英文对照表-梁子同志 ... insignificant 无意义的，轻微的 insolation 曝晒，日照 insoluble 不溶解的.
与太阳有关的英语单词_百度知道 ... 太阳神 Baal;Helios;sun-god;Titan 太阳浴 sun bath;insolation 太阳钟 solarium.
考博英语词汇 ... insidious a． 阴险的；隐匿的；暗中为害的； insolation n. 曝晒；日光浴；中暑 insoluble a. 难以溶解的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin insolatio(n-), from the verb insolare, from in- 'towards' + sol 'sun'

means.word_mean: 1. sudden prostration due to exposure to the sun or excessive heat
